text: Petr Weigl (16 March 1939 – 14 July 2018) was a Czech director and playwright. He created a number of short and feature movies for the Czech and Slovak Television, as well as for German public channel ARD and ZDF, British channels BBC and Channel 4.Fascinace hudbou a filmem - Petr Weigl, Česká televize He was twice nominated for the Emmy Award.
